pages.text: 43|61|Ara niscaya ‘isa kiyamatera niscita nidarsana; kaje'i tomara kiyamate sandeha karona. Ara tomara amara'i anusarana kara. Eta'i sarala patha.
43|62|Sayatana yena tomaderake kichute'i badha na deya, niscaya se tomadera prakasya sakra.

43|63|Ara ‘isa yakhana spasta pramanadisaha asala, takhana tini balechilena, ‘ami abasya'i tomadera kache esechi hikamatasaha ebam tomara ye kichu bisaye matabheda karacha, ta spasta kare deyara jan'ya. Kaje'i tomara allahara taka'oya abalambana kara ebam amara anugatya kara’.
43|64|Niscaya allaha, tini amara raba ebam tomadera'o raba, ata'eba tomara tamra ‘ibadata kara; eta'i sarala patha.’
43|65|Atahpara tadera madhya theke katagulo dala matanaikya karala, kaje'i yalimadera jan'ya durbhoga yantranadayaka dinera sastira
43|66|Tara to tadera ajnatasare hathat kare kiyamata asara'i apeksa karache.
43|67|Bandhura sedina haye parabe eke an'yera satrau, muttakira chara.
43|68|He amara bandagana! Aja tomadera kono bhaya ne'i ebam tomara cintita'o habe na.
43|69|Yara amara ayate imana enechila ebam yara chila musalima
43|70|tomara ebam tomadera strigana [1] sanande jannate prabesa kara.
43|71|Sbarnera thala o panapatra niye taderake pradaksina kara habe; sekhane mana ya caya ebam yate nayana trpta haya ta'i thakabe. Ara sekhane tomara sthayi habe.
43|72|Ara eta'i jannata, tomaderake yara adhikari kara hayeche, tomadera kajera phalasbarupa.
43|73|Sekhane tomadera jan'ya rayeche pracura phalamula, ta theke tomara khabe.
